metadata.dc:author: Astasio Arbiza, P
Ortega Molina, P
García Núñez, J A
Pérez Bravo, L A
Domínguez Rojas, V
De Pereda García, A
metadata.dc:description: We have studied a population of 527 school children between 6 and 17 years old, having as main characteristic to have free odontological care. The prevalence of caries found was 40.4%. The age appears as a risk factor. However, we have not found any influence in the social status. The odontological care is considered essential in the decrease of prevalence of dental caries.
metadata.dc:title: Caries dental: edad, nivel de ingresos y atención odontológica.
[Dental caries: age, income level and dental care].
